'''Alpha v1.2.1'''<ref name="hg">{{ytl|YFLKZ4pWyAg|A proper tour of my Minecraft Fortress|JaqenHghar|November 5, 2010}}</ref> is a version of [[Java Edition Alpha]] released on November 5, 2010,<ref>[[wordofnotch:1486843146|Minecraft Alpha 1.2.1, Minecraft Server 0.2.3]] – The Word of Notch, November 5, 2010</ref> to fix bugs. Although the [[launcher]] claims to have this version available, the version listed is just a duplicate of [[Alpha v1.2.1_01]].

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Oak Leaves JE3 BE4.png|32px]] [[Leaves]]'''
* Particle colors now reflect the biome instead of having the grayscale texture.

=== Mobs ===
'''Hostile mobs '''
* Now only spawn at light level 7 or lower regardless of height.

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Multiplayer]]'''
* Music now plays on [[multiplayer]].

== Fixes ==
'''3 bugs fixed'''
* Signs on the sides of cacti no longer crash the game.
* Optimized CPU usage for mob spawning.
* Music now plays in multiplayer.</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* Excluding pre-reupload versions, Alpha v1.2.1 is the last [[Java Edition]] version that is currently lost.
